caption.p: Allelic richness ( A R) and number of private alleles . (Â±1 SE) for native and non-native populations of various Prosopis species, putative hybrids and Prosopis spp. individuals from South Africa. Native Prosopis and non-native Prosopis groups (i.e. all native and non-native Prosopis individuals, respectively) were analyzed as well. Country codes are: Argentina (Ar), Australia (Au), Chile (Ch), Ethiopia (Et), Hawaii (Hw), Kenya (Ke), Mexico (Me), South Africa (SA) and Tanzania (Tz).
